review: This is very easy to set up and use. Thought there would be more free movies and shows with a Prime account, but you still have to pay for a majority of the good ones. The voice command works great as advertised. They product itself is great, but would like to see Amazon offer more with a Prime account.

author: Tegs "~Tegs"

review: The fire TV was just as everyone has said.  It was easy to install, the picture quality is superb and the feed is fast. I would recommend it over all the others.
author: P. Henry

review: I am pleased with the Fire TV stick.  It arrived as always in perfect "prime" time.  It was an easy set up.  After a few minutes of reviewing what I was looking at, I found it easy to navigate through the providers and options.  I gave it 4 starts instead of 5 because honestly I do not understand why the voice command can only be used with Amazon.  This would be a feature of the actual TV stick and to me Amazon has just chosen that it can only be for Amazon searching to steer you into the direction of choosing Amazon selections to watch primarily.  Silly.  I will watch what I want to as I am still paying for all services independently.  There was no reason not to make that a capability for all networks. Otherwise I am just happy to be able to watch Amazon and Netflix on my large screen TV.
author: Laurie S.
